attributes.action: Hold a national enquiry in to the grooming gangs immediately
attributes.additional_details: Because they are the only ones who can and Because they have a moral duty to every tax payer to do so or are we now a lawless country
attributes.background: To hold ALL the guilty to acount and to give the victims the justice and peace of mind they deserve  law is law and this should not be covered up

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
